title: Object - Convertible Conversion Transaction
description: Object describing a conversion of a convertible security

balance_security_id.description: Identifier for the convertible that holds the remainder balance (for partial conversions)

trigger_id.description: What is the id of the convertible's conversion trigger that resulted in this conversion

capitalization_definition.description: If this conversion event was based on the company's capitalization as calculated at the time of conversion, please specify what stock classes, stock plans and securities were included in the calculation
